Class Spinner

java.lang.Object
  com.threerings.opengl.gui.Component
      com.threerings.opengl.gui.Container
          com.threerings.opengl.gui.Spinner
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigUpdateListener<ManagedConfig>, UIConstants
public class Spinner
extends Container
implements UIConstants

Displays a value with little next and previous buttons.
